title: Christmas Cookies
subtle: Concept (nonfiction), 24 words, Level A (Grade K), Lexile 90L
description: Most kids love making, decorating, and eating cookies, so they are sure to love this book! Christmas Cookies is a delightful book that introduces students to many different shapes used to make Christmas cookies, such as stars, bells, and Santas! The detailed photographs and repetitive text support early emergent readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to classify information as well as visualize to better understand the text.
meta: bell, candle, cookies, flower, name, Santa, snowflake, snowman, tree
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /k/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word make

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
